original_text:
Gods of Asgard Megaways
Le divinità della mitologia norrena hanno sempre esercitato un certo fascino, tanto da diventare le protagoniste di fumetti e film di grande successo. Basti pensare a Thor, Loki e Odino della Marvel, solo per citare i più famosi.
In Gods of Asgard Megaways ritroviamo proprio questi personaggi, a cui si aggiungono Freya, dea della fecondità e Fenrir, il lupo mitologico figlio di Loki. Ci sono poi Huginn e Munimm, i due corvi messaggeri di Odino.
Come è facile intuire, la grafica è il punto forte di questa slot, e riproduce fedelmente Asgard, casa degli Asi, i signori del cielo.
La colonna sonora è incalzante ed epica, per farci immergere ancora di più nelle splendide atmosfere nordiche.
Una griglia speciale
In Gods of Asgard Megaways la griglia ha 6 rulli ma un numero variabile di righe, da 2 a 7, e un rullo orizzontale posto nella parte superiore e che contribuisce a creare combo vincenti. I modi per vincere vanno da 324 a 200.704, come indicato nel contatore laterale a ogni Spin.
La puntata minima è di 0,10 €, ma può essere innalzata a piacimento. L’Autoplay ci permette di impostare un numero variabile di giri automatici e di scegliere alcuni limiti superati i quali questa modalità verrà interrotta.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è di assoluto livello, pari al 96,7%, mentre la volatilità è alta.
Le divinità che aiutano a vincere
Prima di addentrarci tra i vari e molteplici bonus, diamo un’occhiata ai simboli. Per vincere è necessario associare dai 3 ai 6 simboli identici e ogni volta che si ottiene una combo pagante, i simboli che l’hanno generata vengono sostituiti con altri del tutto nuovi. Le carte dal gioco dal dieci all’asso hanno il valore minore, mentre il corno, la coppa, il medaglione, il martello e l’anello ripagano meglio.
Abbiamo due simboli Wild: il lupo sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto quelli speciali. I corvi lo stesso, ma moltiplicano le vincite per 2.
Il fulmine è il nostro Scatter e dà diritto a un numero di partite gratis compreso tra 8 e 20.
Vediamo ora cosa accade quando compaiono le divinità:

Freya: trasforma da 2 a 4 simboli in Wild
Loki: trasforma da 2 a 4 simboli in un simbolo casuale
Thor: trasforma 3 o 4 simboli nel simbolo più alto.
Odino: Trasforma 2 simboli in Wild moltiplicatori. Nei giri gratis, ogni volta che appare il leone, il moltiplicatore aumenta.

raw_translation.response:
Gods of Asgard Megaways

The Norse mythology deities have always been fascinating, so much so that they have become the protagonists of successful comics and movies. Just think of Marvel's Thor, Loki and Odin, to name the most famous.
In Gods of Asgard Megaways, we find these characters, with the addition of Freya, the goddess of fertility, and Fenrir, the mythological wolf, son of Loki. Then there are Huginn and Muninn, Odin's two messenger ravens.
As you can imagine, the graphics are the strong point of this slot machine, faithfully reproducing Asgard, the home of the Aesir, the lords of heaven.
The soundtrack is compelling and epic, immersing us even more in splendid Nordic atmospheres.
A special grid

In Gods of Asgard Megaways, the grid has 6 reels but a variable number of rows, from 2 to 7, and a horizontal roller placed on the top that contributes to creating winning combos. The ways of winning range from 324 to 200,704, as indicated in the counter on each spin.
The minimum bet is €0.10, but it can be raised at will. Autoplay allows us to set a variable number of automatic spins and to choose some limits beyond which this mode will be interrupted.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) is of an absolute level, equal to 96.7%, while the volatility is high.
The deities that help you win

Before delving into the various and multiple bonuses, let's take a look at the symbols. To win, you need to associate 3 to 6 identical symbols and every time you get a paying combo, the symbols that generated it are replaced with completely new ones. The cards from ten to ace have the lowest value, while the horn, cup, medallion, hammer, and ring pay better.
We have two Wild symbols: the Wolf substitutes all symbols except for the special ones. The Ravens do the same, but they multiply winnings by 2.
The lightning bolt is our Scatter and entitles us to a number of free games ranging from 8 to 20.
Now let's see what happens when the deities appear:

Freya: transforms from 2 to 4 symbols into Wild ones
Loki: transforms from 2 to 4 symbols into a random symbol
Thor: transforms 3 or 4 symbols into the highest symbol.
Odin: transforms 2 symbols into multiplier Wilds. In the free spins, every time the lion appears, the multiplier increases.

Where can I play Gods of Asgard Megaways?

In any online casino, keeping in mind that the only legal ones are those with the AAMS seal.

I saw that Gods of Asgard Megaways has an RTP of 96.7%. Is this a good thing?

Yes, it is. Considering that it's a number that applies to a large number of games, the higher this value is, the greater the chance of taking home significant amounts.

I'm not home, but I still want to play Gods of Asgard Megaways. Can I do it on my mobile phone?

Yes, Gods of Asgard Megaways has an architecture that allows you to play on all devices, including smartphones and tablets.

The Norse mythology deities have always been fascinating, so much so that they have become the protagonists of successful comics and movies. Just think of Marvel's Thor, Loki and Odin, to name the most famous.
In Gods of Asgard Megaways, we find these characters, with the addition of Freya, the goddess of fertility, and Fenrir, the mythological wolf, son of Loki. Then there are Huginn and Muninn, Odin's two messenger ravens.
As you can imagine, the graphics are the strong point of this slot machine, faithfully reproducing Asgard, the home of the Aesir, the lords of heaven.
The soundtrack is compelling and epic, immersing us even more in splendid Nordic atmospheres.
A special grid

In Gods of Asgard Megaways, the grid has 6 reels but a variable number of rows, from 2 to 7, and a horizontal roller placed on the top that contributes to creating winning combos. The ways of winning range from 324 to 200,704, as indicated in the counter on each spin.
The minimum bet is €0.10, but it can be raised at will. Autoplay allows us to set a variable number of automatic spins and to choose some limits beyond which this mode will be interrupted.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) is of an absolute level, equal to 96.7%, while the volatility is high.
The deities that help you win

Before delving into the various and multiple bonuses, let's take a look at the symbols. To win, you need to associate 3 to 6 identical symbols and every time you get a paying combo, the symbols that generated it are replaced with completely new ones. The cards from ten to ace have the lowest value, while the horn, cup, medallion, hammer, and ring pay better.
We have two Wild symbols: the Wolf substitutes all symbols except for the special ones. The Ravens do the same, but they multiply winnings by 2.
The lightning bolt is our Scatter and entitles us to a number of free games ranging from 8 to 20.
Now let's see what happens when the deities appear:

Freya: transforms from 2 to 4 symbols into Wild ones
Loki: transforms from 2 to 4 symbols into a random symbol
Thor: transforms 3 or 4 symbols into the highest symbol.
Odin: transforms 2 symbols into multiplier Wilds. In the free spins, every time the lion appears, the multiplier increases.
